author: Melissa Melissa
title: Russia has taken control of Chernobyl nuclear plant, says Ukrainian official
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky warned earlier that Russian troops were attempting to seize the site.
content: An adviser to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said the country has lost control of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant after Ukrainian forces fought to defend it from Russian troops, according tâ€¦ [+2429 chars]
